title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Gamification Science Exploration: Interactive

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: It is possible to visualize and analyze scientific phenomena in 3D using AR technology.
Design interactive storytelling scenarios incorporating gamification elements to explain scientific concepts.

Within one week, learners will perform a team project (3–4 members) using an augmented reality platform (e.g., Unity MARS), propose ≥3-step problem-solving strategies for a given scenario, and achieve "excellent" ratings in ≥4/5 team collaboration evaluation items.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
